about: A passionate programmer and technology lover, I love learning a little more about the world of programming every day.
aboutMe: Full Stack Developer. Committed to continuous learning and staying updated on the latest trends and technologies in the field of development. I have experience with agile methodologies and Scrum, which have allowed me to work effectively in development teams and meet project objectives.
twitter: A Twitter page clone that uses technologies such as SWR, MongoDB, Prisma, among others.
cpcosmeto: A platform for a cosmetology study, used to schedule and manage appointments.
openvino: An administration panel for Openvino wineries, utilizing technologies like NextJS, Websocket, Tailwind CSS, and authentication with MetaMask.
emprendar: A crowdfunding platform that uses technologies such as Next.js, socket.io, passport.js, nodemailer, JWT.
dashboard: A dashboard template built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
node: A clone of the Firefox Send page that allows you to upload and download files. This project uses technologies like Next.js, Node.js, Express, Firebase, Tailwind CSS, JWT.
uptask: A task manager similar to Trello. This app uses technologies like Vite.js, MongoDB, Node.js, Express, Socket.IO, Styled Components, JWT.
productHunt: An imitation of the ProductHunt page where you can post and receive comments. This app uses technologies like Firebase, Next.js, Date-fns, and utility libraries.
ecommerce: An eCommerce template that uses technologies like Next.js, Passport.js, JWT, cookies, local storage, Mercado Pago, react-responsive-carousel.
message: An app where I try to mimic the functionality of a real-time messaging app. This app uses technologies like Next.js, MongoDB, Socket.IO, Mongoose, Nodemailer, JWT, authentication, and localStorage.
spacex: An imitation of the SpaceX page that replicates the design and animations. This landing page is built with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and utilizes the AOS library.
rick: A character search application where you can list and add different characters to favorites. Technologies used include React.js, Express, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
games: An application that utilizes a video game API where you can search, filter, and add new games. This application uses technologies like React.js, Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.
veterinary: An application for a veterinary clinic where you can manage pet appointments. Technologies used include React.js, Tailwind CSS, useState, and useEffect.
constcontrol: An application where you can manage your budget. This application uses technologies like Vite, useState, and useEffect.
cripto: An application where you can check the price of cryptocurrency quotes. This application uses technologies like Vite, data fetching, and styled components.
customer: A customer management system where you can manage your clients. This application uses React.js, useState, and useEffect.
insurance: An application where you can get insurance quotes for vehicles based on their make and model. This application uses technologies like React.js and styled components.
clima: A weather application where you can check the weather conditions. This application uses technologies like React.js and data fetching.
raices: A template for a real estate page, built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
barber: An application for managing appointments at a barbershop, where you can schedule your appointment. This application uses technologies like HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
